pageTitle: Could use an programming API for Nikon Cameras: Nikon FX SLR (DF, D1-D4, D600-D800) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Does anyone think Nikon will enable an open programming API for their cameras?  Need to be able to do this so that our photographers have a much easier publishing workflow. I could really, really use a programming API for these Nikon cameras so that our photographers can  upload photos from the field directly to our CMS for publishing purposes, while at the same time adjusting/cropping/rotating/keywording these images. Apr 25, 2013
